name: Week 1 - Recreation of Molnár 1
description: I wanted to make a recreation of Molnárs work, but with more structure and clean lines. The foundation is made out of Garrit's code example but with my own tweaks and adjustments.

name: Week 1 - Recreation of Molnár 2
description: This version is somewhat inspired by Molnár but with circles instead of squares. The lines has different thickness and colors to make the drawing feel more alive.

name: Week 1 - Recreation of Molnár 3
description: This version is a rework from my 2:nd recreation but with clear flowers instead of circles. The petal shapes were created with help and discussions with ChatGPT.

name: Week 1 - Recreation of Noise 1
description: Slow flowing squares inspired by Garrit's noise-code.

name: Week 1 - Recreation of Noise 2
description: Vibrant circles inspired by Garrit's noise-code.

name: Week 2 - Recreation of Flow Fields 1
description: Recreation inspired by Tyler Hobbs flow fields.

name: Week 2 - The Seashell
description: This is a variation inspired by flow fields, that something is flowingly upbuilding, but I wanted to have something less random and with the vision of resembling a seashell.

name: Week 3 - The Kaleidoscope 1
description: Feel free to paint using the dots by dragging the mouse around.

name: Week 3 - The Kaleidoscope 2
description: Feel free to paint by dragging the mouse around.

name: Week 4 - Flow Field w/ sound
description: Press 'space' to play and stop the sound of the Flow Field.
